text: Ali Khalif Galaydh (, ) (October 14, 1941 â€“ October 8, 2020) was a Somali politician. He was the Prime Minister of Somalia from October 8, 2000 to October 28, 2001.Somalia - Worldstatesmen.com He was a member of the Federal Parliament of Somalia from 2012 until his death. He was also President of the Khatumo State between 2014 until his death. Galaydh was born in Las Anod, Somalia. Galaydh died on October 8, 2020 at a hospital in Jigjiga, Ethiopia from COVID-19 at the age of 78.Dr. Cali Khaliif Galayr oo geeriyoodayFormer Somali PM Ali Khalif Galaydh Dies of COVID-19 At The Age of 79 ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Somalia Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic
title: Ali Khalif Galaydh
